item.title: Gumbel-Softmax Flow Matching with Straight-Through Guidance for Controllable Biological Sequence Generation
item.description: Gumbel-Softmax Flow Matching enables controllable biological sequence generation with straight-through guidance, scaling efficiently to high-dimensional simplices.
